actions.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A063) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment (A063) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA) to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A063) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A063) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA) to the Rules amendment (A001).

amends_amendment.description: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.
amends_amendment.purpose: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.

description: An amendment No. 22 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to strike language that sets up a new procedural criteria for an FMCSA study on minimum trucking insurance that is already underway.
purpose: Amendment sought to strike language that sets up a new procedural criteria for an FMCSA study on minimum trucking insurance that is already underway.
